articles.title: To surge or not to surge, the algorithm is the question - Financial Times
articles.description: From rides to burgers, consumers may balk when differential pricing comes to their favourite real-world businesses
articles.content: Surge pricing is something that anyone who takes a ride share on a regular basis has become used to. Try calling an Uber or Lyft on a rainy day during the dinner hour or around the school pick-up or … [+5303 chars]
